item.title: Tutorial: Awesome Presentations with CodeHike
item.description: Background At work, we’ve been focusing on building components that are reusable and more flexible throughout our application. Because of this, we’ve been focusing on making components more composable. To really drive that point home, I gave a small presentation using an awesome library called Code Hike. If you haven’t seen Code Hike before, you should definitely stop right here and at least give Rodrigo Pombo’s (the author of Code Hike) amazing article on Build Your Own React a quick look.
